alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:46AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Duval County through 1015 AM CDT... At 945 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Freer, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tropical funnel clouds possible. Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freer. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 770 and 778. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
